title: Cosmonautica v1.08
description:
Cosmonautica v1.08 cracked


Extract 7zip, launch game with CosmoNautica launcher.exe in the bin folder



Update 1.0.8 (with a seeded special challenge mode)
October 2 - chosen	
Hi fellow space captains,

the new update is here and we've got some fine things for you :)
For a fast update, please log out and back into Steam.

So, first off let me tell you what's new:

    Special Early Access Cosmob hunt (seeded challenge mode)
    Planet traits display on the solar map
    Space station interior
    Pirate ships roam the outer rims and are ready to attack you if you come too close
    ETA display during flight 

Make sure to post some screenshots of your challenge run to compare yourself to all the other captains ;)

And of course we've improved some stuff:

    Shipyard offers a cancel option while placing rooms
    The space station now has an external view mode (with zoom-on-ship feature)
    Lots of new sounds
    More missions and random events
    Tons of bugfixes and maybe some new bugs for you to find ;)
